channel.title: Pip.Services Docs â€“ Redis
channel.description: Recent content in Redis on Pip.Services Docs

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description:
import 'package:pip_services3_commons/pip_services3_commons.dart';
import 'package:pip_services3_redis/pip_services3_redis.dart';

var lock = RedisLock();
lock.configure(ConfigParams.fromTuples(
    ['connection.host', 'localhost', 'connection.port', 6379]));

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description:
import (
	conf "github.com/pip-services3-gox/pip-services3-commons-gox/config"
	rlock "github.com/pip-services3-gox/pip-services3-redis-gox/lock"
)


lock := rlock.NewRedisLock()
lock.Configure(context.Background(), conf.NewConfigParamsFromTuples(
	"connection.host", "localhost",
	"connection.port", 6379,
))

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description:
from pip_services3_commons.config import ConfigParams

lock = RedisLock()
lock.configure(ConfigParams.from_tuples(
    "connection.host", "localhost",
    "connection.port", 6379
))

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description: var locked = await lock.tryAcquireLock(null, 'key1', 3300);

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description: locked = lock.try_acquire_lock("123", "key1", 3300) # returns bool

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description: await lock.acquireLock(null, 'key1', 3000, 1000);

item.description: err = lock.AcquireLock(context.Background(), "123", "key1", 3000, 1000)

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description: rLock.AcquireLock(null, "key1", 3000, 1000);

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description: await lock.acquireLock(null, "key1", 3000, 1000);

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description: lock.acquire_lock("123", "key1", 3000, 1000)

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description: await lock.releaseLock(null, 'key1');

item.description: err = lock.ReleaseLock(context.Background(), "123", "key1")

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description: await lock.releaseLock(null, "key1");

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description: lock.release_lock("123", "key1")

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description:
import 'package:pip_services3_commons/pip_services3_commons.dart';
import 'package:pip_services3_redis/pip_services3_redis.dart';

var lock = RedisLock();
lock.configure(ConfigParams.fromTuples(
  ['connection.host', 'localhost', 'connection.port', 6379]));

await lock.open(null);
await lock.acquireLock(null, 'key1', 3000, 1000);

try {
  // Processing...
} finally {
  await lock.releaseLock(null, 'key1');
}

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description:
import (
	conf "github.com/pip-services3-gox/pip-services3-commons-gox/config"
	rlock "github.com/pip-services3-gox/pip-services3-redis-gox/lock"
)

lock := rlock.NewRedisLock()
lock.Configure(context.Background(), conf.NewConfigParamsFromTuples(
	"connection.host", "localhost",
	"connection.port", 6379,
))
err := lock.Open(context.Background(), "123")

err = lock.AcquireLock(context.Background(), "123", "key1", 3000, 1000)

defer lock.ReleaseLock(context.Background(), "123", "key1")

// Processing...

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description:
using PipServices3.Redis.Lock;
using PipServices3.Commons.Config;

var rLock = new RedisLock();
rLock.Configure(ConfigParams.FromTuples(
    "connection.host", "localhost",
    "connection.port", 6379
));


await rLock.OpenAsync(null);

rLock.AcquireLock(null, "key1", 3000, 1000);

try
{
    // Processing...
} finally
{
    rLock.ReleaseLock(null, "key1");
}

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description:
import { RedisLock } from 'pip-services3-redis-nodex';
import { ConfigParams } from 'pip-services3-commons-nodex';

let lock = new RedisLock();
lock.configure(ConfigParams.fromTuples(
    "connection.host", "localhost",
    "connection.port", 6379
));

await lock.open(null);
await lock.acquireLock(null, "key1", 3000, 1000);

try {
    // Processing...
} finally {
    await lock.releaseLock(null, "key1");
}

item.title: Tutorials:
item.description:
from pip_services3_redis.lock import RedisLock
from pip_services3_commons.config import ConfigParams

lock = RedisLock()
lock.configure(ConfigParams.from_tuples(
    "connection.host", "localhost",
    "connection.port", 6379
))

lock.open("123")

lock.acquire_lock("123", "key1", 3000, 1000)

try:
    # Processing...
    pass
finally:
    lock.release_lock("123", "key1")
